titles.title: Out of the fulness of my heart,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Out of the fulness of my heart,
Jesus, I worship You,
Here in Your presence beyond the veil,
Father I've come to adore.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And oh my heart cries Father,
My heart cries Father,
Father, I love You more and more,
Out of the fulness of my heart,
Jesus, I worship You.
